name: Backcountry Container Pool Deck Plan – 10x12 Elevated Deck
open_features: (6) 18×18×12 in concrete footings with 6×6 SP No.2 posts
Railings: 4×4 posts with 2×4 rails, 2×2 balusters @6 in O.C., max 4 in spacing
Hardware: Simpson ABU66Z bases, LUS28 hangers, LPC4Z caps, HUC412 hangers, A34 clips, LSC connectors
Pool integration schematic only; barriers, alarms, and anti-entrapment features by licensed pool professionals
safety_note: Plans are preliminary; final engineering, pool safety systems, and local permitting must be addressed by licensed professionals.
